alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central York, Rockingham, Strafford, southeastern Hillsborough, southeastern Belknap and southeastern Merrimack Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Derry, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Nashua, Derry, Rochester, Durham, Exeter, Merrimack, Salem, Northwood, Dover, Bedford, Hooksett, Somersworth, Amherst, Barrington, Litchfield, Hollis, Berwick, Farmington and Epping. This includes the following highways... Interstate 293 between mile markers 1 and 8. Interstate 93 between mile markers 1 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough
